title: Marketing expert to optimize all channels to build my brand
snippet:
Hello all, 
I'm looking for some help with the sales and marketing for my business. Some of the items I need help with are:
- SEO setting optimization
- Instagram posts
- Twitter adverts
- Google crawl process
- possible blog/content posts

Eager to hear from you. You will be a part of a fun, earthy and growing business that provides healthy, natural products for mothers. 

Speak soon!
